characters.story: Troops with axes march cheerfully singing "Bing!" as soldiers in formation!
Silk threads sing "Si!" cheerfully as they shimmer and flow like two rivers!
A line of silk commands "Shian!" sharply, connecting thread to thread in perfect rows!
To maintain silk threads, the bird questions "Way? How to hold together?" curiously!
Silk gauze from Spiderman's net questions "Lwo? Strong enough?" as he eats turkey for silk supply!
To continue the silk sale, you command "Shu!" sharply, extending the thread further!
A continuum of silk flows, bending down drooping like "Tong" - all unified together!
To give silk and fit together bends down drooping saying "Gay" generously!
To tie silk threads at the altar questions "Jieh? Married?" as the knot forms!
The end of silk and winter sings "Zhong!" cheerfully as threads finish!
A rank of silk and reach questions "Ji? What level?" like Spider-man taking the JLPT!
An epoch of silk history commands "Ji!" sharply, chronicling ages in threads!
Red silk and work question "Hong? Why so crimson?" curiously blushing!
To make an appointment with silk wrap sings "Yueh!" cheerfully promising to meet!
Fine silk and field command "Shi!" sharply, delicate as a hair!
Tight silk with firm hold bends down drooping saying "Jeen" - tense like a drawn bow!
To weave silk with sound sings "Zhi!" cheerfully interlacing threads!
A net of silk bends down drooping saying "Wang" - catching like a spider's web!
Green silk of grass and water commands "Lyu!" sharply, colored like spring!
Curved thread and bow sing "Wan!" cheerfully bending in an arc!
A bay of water curves, singing "Wan!" cheerfully like a gulf!
To be enamored, thread and heart command "Lian!" sharply - romance pulls tight!
To change thread and strike yells "Bian!" sharply - rebellion transforms everything!
Scripture threads through time, singing "Jing!" cheerfully as sacred sutras pass through!
Lightweight car on silk threads sings "Ching!" cheerfully - so gentle and easy!
Behind the path with thread commands "Ho!" sharply at the rear!
How many small threads bend down drooping saying "Ji?" - just a few!
A machine of trees and threads sings "Ji!" cheerfully - an opportunity clicking like an abacus!
To sever threads with ax commands "Dwan!" sharply - Gimli cutting silk in the factory!
To carry on silk rice commands "Ji!" sharply, inheriting the thread!
Obvious thread appears, bending down drooping saying "Shian" - conspicuous to all!
Music from white tree commands "Yueh!" sharply - melodies sing with joy!
Medicine grass music commands "Yao!" sharply - herbs that cure and heal!
A chicken bird sings "Ji!" cheerfully - part griffin, part turkey!
"What, me?" says the hemp thread neutrally, questioning at sentence's end!
Lineage silk held commands "Shi!" sharply - connection through generations!
Related to person lineage commands "Shi!" sharply - bound by connection!
